We work in an agile environment. There are two versions of this website, one for mobile and the other for desktop.

works.stack: HTML5, CSS3, javaScript, jQuery, firebase, parse, mustache templates, media queries
works.features: Responsive, Vector (SVG) images, JSON, Mobile first.
works.description: Hey! It's the page that you're already on :) This website, as you may have guessed was designed and semantically hand coded from scratch by me using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and javaScript on a bootstrap framework. To dynamically render the portfolio cards, I ping an API that I built and am hosting on firebase. The images are coming from my image dump on Parse. I also take advantage of SVG vector images and animation. It is fully responsive and supports all major browsers.
works.name: Portfolio

works.roles: Visual Designer, UX, Front End Developer
